name: Fantasy Mosaics 7
description:
New colorful mosaic puzzles are waiting for you in this fun installment of Fantasy Mosaics!

This time you join our penguin family on a new adventure to decorate their house on an alien planet and prepare for the upcoming baby penguin!

Challenge yourself with this exciting collection of custom built multi-color puzzles and have fun discovering stunning images hidden in the logic of numbers.

This app is not compatible with 1st generation iPads.


- Lots of custom built puzzles in color also known as picross, hanjie, nonograms, griddlers, paint by numbers.

- Decorate a house for the penguin family

- Stunning background art

- Puzzles based solely on logic
